inputs.questions: Resuma o conteúdo dos arquivos fornecidos

output.resposta: Felipe De Assis enviou um e-mail para a equipe de suporte ao cliente relatando um problema com um produto defeituoso, o Mountain-500 Silver, tamanho 42, comprado em 1º de junho de 2008, com o ID de pedido 71780. Apesar de seguir todas as etapas recomendadas de solução de problemas, o produto continua apresentando problemas. Felipe acredita que o produto se qualifica para reembolso de acordo com a política de satisfação do cliente e solicita orientação sobre os procedimentos necessários para resolver a questão, além de pedir suporte para uma resolução rápida. Ele destaca a importância do produto em suas atividades diárias e aguarda uma resposta pronta da equipe de suporte.

children.name: my_python_tool
children.output: [b'{"content": {"subject": "Support Request for Defective Product - Mountain-500 Silver, 42 (Order ID 71780)", "from": "Felipe De Assis <Felipe.Assis@microsoft.com>", "to": "Felipe De Assis <Felipe.Assis@microsoft.com>", "body": "Subject: Support Request for Defective Product - Mountain-500 Silver, 42 (Order ID 71780)  Dear Customer Support Team,  I am writing to you concerning a product issue related to my purchase made on June 1st, 2008, with the order ID 71780. The product in question is the Mountain-500 Silver, 42, which was acquired through a sales representative at your store.  Regrettably, this product has not been operating as expected. Despite following all the recommended troubleshooting steps, the issues persist, leading me to believe that it qualifies for reimbursement as per your customer satisfaction policy.  Given the product\'s importance in my daily activities, I am keen to resolve this matter promptly. I would appreciate guidance on the necessary procedures to address this issue and request your support in facilitating a swift resolution.  Thank you for your attention to this matter and I look forward to your prompt response.  Warm regards, Raja D. Venugopal"}}']

inputs.prompt:
system:
You are responsible for extracting the order number from the provided text.
The order number is composed of, at minumum, 5 numeric digits. 
Avoid returning any additional detail, return only the order number. 
If there is no order number in the text, return "-1".

# EXAMPLES
User: My order number is 12345
Assistant: 12345
User: I'd like to receive an update about my order, which is number 76222.
Assistant: 76222
User: Order number: 33581 Name: Michael Stevens 
Assistant: 33581
User: My name is John and I'd like to know more about my order.
Assistant: -1
